de.mpg.aai.shhaa
Class HttpAuthService

java.lang.Object
  de.mpg.aai.shhaa.HttpAuthService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Configurable
public class HttpAuthService
extends java.lang.Object
implements Configurable

the aai-authn/z handler, main service to handle fetching authentication data, authorization and setting return targets (basic "view control")

Author:
megger

handleAuth

public AAIServletRequest handleAuth(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                             throws de.mpg.aai.security.auth.AuthException
main function to handle the whole authn/z flow, handles retrieval of the current authentication context (status), loads user attributes (for access-control) checks access-permission (authorization) of the current user for the requested resource and provides AAIServletRequest with proper authentication data (and possibly a reroute target (e.g. fwd to "access-denied" page)

Parameters:
request - current request to check
response - current request's response
Returns:
AAIServletRequest with proper authentication data (principal)
Throws:
de.mpg.aai.security.auth.AuthException - if something failed in the control flow (not on e.g. access-denied, such is handled inside)
